text: Blakey is a surname, and may refer to: * Art Blakey **Blakey (album), a 1954 album by Art Blakey * George Blakey * John Blakey * Marion Blakey * Michael Blakey (disambiguation) * Nicholas Blakey (died 1758), Irish-born draughtsman and engraver * Richard Blakey * G. Robert Blakey, a law professor and an expert on organized crime * Cyril "Blakey" Blake, an inspector in sitcom On the Buses played by Stephen Lewis * DJ Blakey, a DJ from London, UK Also in the place name: * Blakey Ridge, a ridge of hills near Kirkbymoorside, North Yorkshire ==See also== * Blaikie * Blake
title: Blakey
